welcomeEmail.subject: Reset Password
welcomeEmail.title: Welcome
welcomeEmail.paragraph: In the following link you can access to the Backoffice organization with yours credentials
welcomeEmail.paragraph2: in the first login you must change your password

welcomeUserEmail.subject: Reset Password
welcomeUserEmail.title: Welcome
welcomeUserEmail.paragraph2: To complete your registration on the platform you will need to change your password.

publishedProjectEmail.subject: Project published
publishedProjectEmail.title: Published Project!
publishedProjectEmail.paragraph2: has been published. You can check all the details of the publication website in the following link.

resetPasswordEmail.subject: Recovery Password
resetPasswordEmail.title: Reset password
resetPasswordEmail.paragraph: You have requested to reset your password. Click the following link to choose a new password.
resetPasswordEmail.paragraph2: If you have not requested to reset your password you can ignore and delete this message.

cloneInReviewEmail.subject: Project review has been requested
cloneInReviewEmail.title: A review of the project has been requested.
cloneInReviewEmail.paragraphPart2: has been edited. This will be approved or rejected by the project administrator.

cloneApprovedEmail.subject: Project changes has been approved
cloneApprovedEmail.title: The changes requested in the project have been approved.
cloneApprovedEmail.paragraphPart1: A new version of the project
cloneApprovedEmail.paragraphPart2: has been released. You will be able to check out all new changes in the project changelog.

cloneRejectedEmail.subject: Project changes has been rejected
cloneRejectedEmail.title: The changes requested in the project have been rejected.
cloneRejectedEmail.paragraphPart1: No changes were made to the project
cloneRejectedEmail.paragraphPart2: You will be able to review the administrator's comments in the project changelog.

changelog.title: Project Changelog
changelog.empty: No entries in the changelog yet
changelog.error: An error occurred while fetching the changelogs

evidences.emptyEvidences: There are no evidences uploaded yet

modalApproveEvidence.textConfirmation: Are you sure you want to approve the following evidence?

modalRejectEvidence.title: You are about to reject an evidence
modalRejectEvidence.leaveComment: Please select the reason and leave a comment for the beneficiary or the founder.
modalRejectEvidence.ruleComment: Must write a reason for rejection

modalPublishSuccess.title: The project has been published
modalPublishSuccess.success: The project has been published successfully. you can see it from here.

modalConfirmWithSK.confirm: Do you want to confirm the creation of the project?
modalConfirmWithSK.confirmDescription: To confirm the process enter your administrator password and secret key

changelogAction.legalAgreementFile: uploaded a new legal agreement file
changelogAction.projectProposalFile: uploaded a new project proposal file
changelogAction.problemAddressed: set a new about the project
changelogAction.mission: set a new mission and vision of the project
changelogAction.errorFetching: An error occurred while fetching the changelogs
